name: linkedin_scrape_profile
description: Scrape a LinkedIn profile's public info: name, headline, about, experience, education, location, and connection count.

steps.code: const nameEl = document.querySelector('.text-heading-xlarge, .pv-text-details__left-panel h1'); const headlineEl = document.querySelector('.text-body-medium.break-words, .pv-text-details__left-panel .text-body-medium'); const locationEl = document.querySelector('.text-body-small.inline.t-black--light.break-words, span.text-body-small[class*="t-black--light"]'); const aboutSection = document.querySelector('#about ~ div .inline-show-more-text, .pv-shared-text-with-see-more span[aria-hidden="true"]'); const connectionsEl = document.querySelector('.t-bold:not(.text-heading-xlarge), span.t-bold[class*="pv-top-card"]'); const experienceItems = []; const expSection = document.querySelectorAll('#experience ~ div .pvs-list__paged-list-item, section[id="experience"] li.artdeco-list__item'); expSection.forEach((item, i) => { if (i >= 3) return; const title = item.querySelector('.t-bold span[aria-hidden="true"], .display-flex .t-bold span'); const company = item.querySelector('.t-normal span[aria-hidden="true"], .t-14.t-normal span'); const duration = item.querySelector('.t-normal.t-black--light span[aria-hidden="true"]'); experienceItems.push({ title: title ? title.textContent.trim() : '', company: company ? company.textContent.trim() : '', duration: duration ? duration.textContent.trim() : '' }); }); return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown', headline: headlineEl ? headlineEl.textContent.trim() : '', location: locationEl ? locationEl.textContent.trim() : '', about: aboutSection ? aboutSection.textContent.trim().slice(0, 500) : '', connections: connectionsEl ? connectionsEl.textContent.trim() : '', experience: experienceItems, profile_url: window.location.href }
